name: $read
desc: Read the state of a specific version of the resource.

name: $vread
desc: Update an existing resource by its id.

name: $update
desc: Update an existing resource by its id (or create it if it is new).

name: $updateCreate
desc: Patch an existing resource by its id.

name: $patch
desc: Delete a resource.

name: $delete
desc: Conditionally delete a single resource based on search parameters.

name: $deleteCondSingle
desc: Conditionally delete one or more resources based on search parameters.

name: $deleteCondMultiple
desc: Retrieve the change history for a particular resource or resource type.

name: $history
desc: Create a new resource with a server assigned id.

name: $create
desc: Search based on some filter criteria.

name: $search
desc: Update, create or delete a set of resources as independent actions.

name: $batch
desc: Update, create or delete a set of resources as a single transaction.

name: $transaction
desc: Get a capability statement for the system.

name: $capabilities
desc: Realizes an ActivityDefinition in a specific context

name: $apply
desc: Closure Table Maintenance

name: $closure
desc: Finding Codes based on supplied properties

name: $find-matches
desc: Compare two systems CapabilityStatements

name: $conforms
desc: Aggregates and returns the parameters and data requirements for a resource and all its dependencies as a single module definition

name: $data-requirements
desc: Generate a Document

name: $document
desc: Request clinical decision support guidance based on a specific decision support module

name: $evaluate
desc: Invoke an eMeasure and obtain the results

name: $evaluate-measure
desc: Return all the related information as described in the Encounter or Patient

name: $everything
desc: Value Set Expansion

name: $expand
desc: Find a functional list

name: $find
desc: Invoke a GraphQL query

name: $graphql
desc: Test if a server implements a client's required operations

name: $implements
desc: Last N Observations Query

name: $lastn
desc: Concept Look Up and Decomposition

name: $lookup
desc: Find patient matches using MPI based logic

name: $match
desc: Access a list of profiles, tags, and security labels

name: $meta
desc: Add profiles, tags, and security labels to a resource

name: $meta-add
desc: Delete profiles, tags, and security labels for a resource

name: $meta-delete
desc: Populate Questionnaire

name: $populate
desc: Generate HTML for Questionnaire

name: $populatehtml
desc: Generate a link to a Questionnaire completion webpage

name: $populatelink
desc: Process a message according to the defined event

name: $process-message
desc: Build Questionnaire

name: $questionnaire

name: $stats
desc: Fetch a subset of the CapabilityStatement resource

desc: CodeSystem Subsumption Testing

name: $translate
desc: Validate a resource
